name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_3b7b27f6-4e16-4c2b-863e-9fc76ed50761
text:
rule sw_malware_win_lokibot_c2 {
    //THIS IS FOR SECOPS WORKSHOP, PLEASE DO NOT EDIT OR RUN RETROHUNTS ON THIS RULE
  meta:
    author = "Google Cloud Security"
    description = "Identify default Lokibot C2 Traffic"
    mitre_attack_tactic = "Command and Control"
    mitre_attack_technique = "Application Layer Protocol: Web Protocols"
    mitre_attach_url = "https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1071/001/"
    mitre_attack_version = "v13.1"
    severity = "Critical"
    priority = "Critical"

  events:
    $network.metadata.log_type = "ZSCALER_WEBPROXY"
    $network.metadata.event_type = "NETWORK_HTTP"
    $network.target.url = /.*\/fre\.php/

  outcome:
    $risk_score = 90
    $mitre_attack_tactic = "Command and Control"
    $mitre_attack_technique = "Application Layer Protocol: Web Protocols"
    $mitre_attack_technique_id = "T1071.001"
    $principal_hostname = $network.principal.hostname
    $principal_ip = array_distinct($network.principal.ip)
    $principal_mac = array_distinct($network.principal.mac)
    $target_hostname = $network.target.hostname
    $target_url = $network.target.url

  condition:
    $network
}
author: Google Cloud Security
